article:
The 'Atari Coldfire Project' ('ACP') or ('FireBee') is a volunteer project that
aims to create a modern Atari computer clone. [http://www.atarimusic.net/index.php/component/content/article/37-

Firebee - An Atari Coldfire Clone Built for Music], 18 May 2010, Atari Music Network [http://blog.noblemaster.com/2010/12/16/atari-coldfire-
